column1:
body {
    	text-align: center;
    	background: #00ECB9;
      font-family: sans-serif;
      font-weight: 100;
    }
    h1 {
      color: #396;
      font-weight: 100;
      font-size: 40px;
      margin: 40px 0px 20px;
    }
    #clockdiv{
    	font-family: sans-serif;
    	color: #fff;
    	display: inline-block;
    	font-weight: 100;
    	text-align: center;
    	font-size: 30px;
    }
    #clockdiv > div {
    	padding: 10px;
    	border-radius: 3px;
    	background: #00BF96;
    	display: inline-block;
    }
    #clockdiv div > span {
    	padding: 15px;
    	border-radius: 3px;
    	background: #00816A;
    	display: inline-block;
    }
    .smalltext {
    	padding-top: 5px;
    	font-size: 16px;
    }
